# Project Configuration

This project uses a combination of **environment variables** and optional **YAML/JSON configuration files** to manage configuration settings across different environments (development, staging, production).

## Environment Variables

We use a `.env` file to store sensitive and environment-specific values. These values are loaded into the application using a Go library such as [`github.com/joho/godotenv`](https://github.com/joho/godotenv).

### `.env` values:
Below is the env value of database of the project.
